title: Crypto Market Pauses After Growth
description: Market Picture The crypto market capitalisation has been hovering around $2.97 trillion since the end of last week. The market has recovered to its 200-day moving average, but is hesitant to overcome it, as we see in the case of Bitcoin. The sentiment in the markets is neutral. title: Solana Rises as Crypto Investors Eye New Highs
description: The global crypto market continues to be very interested in Solana in 2025, being nicknamed SOL for trading.
